Skill.Name: Keen Edge
Skill.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.

Skill.Name: No Mercy
Skill.Description: Increases damage dealt by 20%. Duration: 20s

Skill.Name: Brutal Shell
Skill.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100. Combo Action: Keen Edge Combo Potency: 300 Combo Bonus: Restores own HP Cure Potency: 150 Combo Bonus: Creates a barrier which nullifies damage equaling HP restored Duration: 10s

Skill.Name: Camouflage
Skill.Description: Increases parry rate by 50% while reducing damage taken by 10%. Duration: 20s

Skill.Name: Demon Slice
Skill.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all nearby enemies.

Skill.Name: Royal Guard
Skill.Description: Significantly increases enmity generation. Effect ends upon reuse.

Skill.Name: Lightning Shot
Skill.Description: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 150. Additional Effect: Increased enmity

Skill.Name: Danger Zone
Skill.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 350.

Skill.Name: Solid Barrel
Skill.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100. Combo Action: Brutal Shell Combo Potency: 400 Combo Bonus: Adds a Cartridge to your Powder Gauge

Skill.Name: Burst Strike
Skill.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 500. Cartridge Cost: 1

Skill.Name: Nebula
Skill.Description: Reduces damage taken by 30%. Duration: 15s

Skill.Name: Demon Slaughter
Skill.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies. Combo Action: Demon Slice Combo Potency: 250 Combo Bonus: Adds a Cartridge to your Powder Gauge

Skill.Name: Aurora
Skill.Description: Grants Regen to target. Cure Potency: 200 Duration: 18s

Skill.Name: Superbolide
Skill.Description: Reduces HP to 1 and renders you impervious to most attacks. Duration: 8s

Skill.Name: Sonic Break
Skill.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300. Additional Effect: Damage over time Potency: 90 Duration: 30s This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

Skill.Name: Rough Divide
Skill.Description: Delivers a jumping attack with a potency of 200. Maximum Charges: 2 Cannot be executed while bound.

Skill.Name: Gnashing Fang
Skill.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 450. Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Rip Duration: 10s Cartridge Cost: 1 This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

Skill.Name: Savage Claw
Skill.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 550. Combo Action: Gnashing Fang Combo Bonus: Grants Ready to Tear Duration: 10s

Skill.Name: Wicked Talon
Skill.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 650. Combo Action: Savage Claw Combo Bonus: Grants Ready to Gouge Duration: 10s

Skill.Name: Bow Shock
Skill.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200 to all nearby enemies. Additional Effect: Damage over time Potency: 90 Duration: 15s

Skill.Name: Heart of Light
Skill.Description: Reduces magic damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%. Duration: 15s

Skill.Name: Heart of Stone
Skill.Description: Reduces damage taken by a party member or self by 15%. Duration: 7s Additional Effect: When targeting a party member while under the effect of Brutal Shell, that effect is also granted to the target Duration: 10s

Skill.Name: Continuation
Skill.Description: Allows the firing of successive rounds with your gunblade. Gnashing Fang may be followed by Jugular Rip. Savage Claw may be followed by Abdomen Tear. Wicked Talon may be followed by Eye Gouge.

Skill.Name: Jugular Rip
Skill.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 260. Can only be executed when Ready to Rip.
※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Skill.Name: Abdomen Tear
Skill.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 280. Can only be executed when Ready to Tear.
※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Skill.Name: Eye Gouge
Skill.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 300. Can only be executed when Ready to Gouge.
※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Skill.Name: Fated Circle
Skill.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 320 to all nearby enemies. Cartridge Cost: 1

Skill.Name: Bloodfest
Skill.Description: Draws aetheric energy from target, adding 2 Cartridges to your Powder Gauge.

Skill.Name: Blasting Zone
Skill.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 800.

Skill.Name: Rampart
Skill.Description: Reduces damage taken by 20%. Duration: 20s

Skill.Name: Low Blow
Skill.Description: Stuns target. Duration: 5s

Skill.Name: Provoke
Skill.Description: Gesture threateningly, placing yourself at the top of a target's enmity list while gaining additional enmity.

Skill.Name: Interject
Skill.Description: Interrupts the use of a target's action.

Skill.Name: Reprisal
Skill.Description: Reduces damage dealt by nearby enemies by 10%. Duration: 10s

Skill.Name: Arm's Length
Skill.Description: Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects. Duration: 6s Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck Duration: 15s

Skill.Name: Shirk
Skill.Description: Diverts 25% of enmity to target party member.
